C# and Javascript projects

www.ValeTales.info blog.

Attending Networking Events

Tracking Industry Trends

Participating in Industry Discussions
…

positions.title: Production Support
positions.description:
• Oversaw system testing, maintenance, debugging and enhancement for leading publishing corporation.
• Provided user support of Windows-based applications, performing trouble-shooting for remote users with globally-distributed databases across the US, Canada, Australia and New Zealand.
• Traced and corrected a high volume of data issues, streamlining processes for system updates and corrections.
• Ensured full functionality retail sales application used by more than 600 company representatives and retailers.
• Resolved a high volume of data integrity issues, syncing information across user laptops, systems and databases.
• Created processes to maintain reliability of data, purging outdated records and managing replication of database.
• Trained new staff regarding database systems and protocols, and testing procedures.
…
see more

positions.title: Support Services
positions.description:
• Provided technical support to 120 traders, ensuring system functionality throughout up to 300,000 trades per day.
• Conducted testing of lines using FIX protocol, monitoring and repairing TCP/IP connections for more than 70 clients.
• Supervised team while serving as Lead Programmer, creating reports on orders, trades and stock symbols for traders.
• Implemented automated reconciliations for key clients, impacting accounts valued at over $1 million.
• Managed backup site, keeping all TCP/IP line connections, software and databases up-to-date.
• Facilitated collaboration between 90 external trading partners, performing after-hours testing of TCP/IP lines.
…
see more

positions.title: Programmer/Analyst
positions.description:
• Introduced interactive debugging technology to Development team, leading to $500,000 cost reduction.
• Conducted staff trainings on software features, generating nearly 100% increase in team efficiency and accuracy.
• Coordinated buy-ins from 96 systems and application platforms, facilitating long-term profitable relationships.
• Significantly improved system functionality by implementing new data distribution technologies throughout company platforms operating across the U.S., Europe and the Middle East.
• Initially hired as Programmer, promoted to role of Analyst following consistently positive performance reviews.
…
see more

positions.title: Programmer/Analyst
positions.description:
Supervised two programmers in implementing Order Entry Network System.
The PubNet system linked publishers into a network that allowed bookstores to enter orders online.
Designed, tested, and implemented Billing System for publishing business. This system generates invoices and is fed from the Order, Customer, and Book Product data bases.
Increased efficiency of applications using sorting and indexing techniques.
…
see more

given.text:
Rene's job searching advice and coaching runs both wide and deep. She will listen closely to your story, help you fine-tune the choice of target career, and then give you avenues and techniques to reach that goal. She will find ways to pump up your enthusiasm if it seems to be flagging. Her time as a career coach at the Five O'Clock club feeds this fountain of knowledge and good judgement. She has also written a valuable guide to making your later years fulfilling: Achieving the Good Life After 50.
…
